title: Senior PHP Magento Developer
description: fram^ is currently looking for driven Principal Magento Developers to join our team and work on our new project. You will collaborate closely with the Development team and our international client to develop a new leading platform in Ecommerce industry.
requirements:
- 4-7 years of experience in PHP
- Experienced (andd certified) in Magento 2.1+ and follow Magento best practices
- Experienced in optimizing the code & server for high traffic websites
- Experienced with Varnish, Redis, RabbitMQ and ElasticSearch
- Familiar with MySQL, MariaDB or Percona, design databases and solve performance issues
- Familiar with front-end web technologies like HTML, CSS and JavaScript (e.g. RequireJS, Knockout.js and React)
- Familiar with Google Analytics, Google AdWords, Google Shopping, Google Tag Manager
- Familiar with e-commerce functionalities in social media like Facebook and Instagram
- Able to write well-structured, maintainable code
- Can-do-attitude and put the goals of the team before your own prestige
- You are able and hungry to take on a lot of responsibility
- Very good English is a must
- Familiar with writing unit test in PHPUnit
